trans-unit.source: Associates a data source column with a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column, and is implemented by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> class, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
The <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping> interface enables an inheriting class to implement a Column Mapping class, which associates a data source column with a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column.
For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md).
An application does not create an instance of the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping> interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping>.
Classes that inherit <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping> must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
For example, the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping> interface defines the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping.DataSetColumn%2A> property.
In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> class inherits this property, and also defines the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping.GetDataColumnBySchemaAction%2A> method.
Gets or sets the name of the column within the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
The name of the column within the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
The name is not case sensitive.
Gets or sets the name of the column within the data source to map from.
The case-sensitive name of the column in the data source.
